item.content:encoded:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xe4dtZT55Xc

值得閱讀的理由

  • 深入了解 Minisforum 旗下三款中階迷你主機 UM750L Slim、UM760 Plus 及 UM760 Slim 的全面比較，涵蓋其規格、設計、內部構造與性能表現。
  • 詳細分析搭載 AMD Ryzen 5 7545U 與 Ryzen 5 7640HS 處理器的迷你主機，在基準測試、影音轉碼、遊戲及 AI 運算等不同應用場景下的實際效能差異。
  • 提供對這些中階迷你主機的穩定性、散熱表現及 BIOS 設定的深度洞察，協助讀者評估其在預算範圍內是否能滿足日常及特定專業需求。

摘要

Minisforum 中階迷你主機陣容登場

作者指出，Minisforum 曾以 UM480XT、UM560XT 和 UM690S 等機型稱霸千元級迷你主機市場，其中 UM690S 更是長期穩定運行的經典款。如今，Minisforum 推出了三款新的中階迷你主機，分別是配備 Oculink 接口 的銀色 UM760 Plus、深空黑色的 UM760 Slim 以及同樣銀色的 UM750L Slim。這些機型旨在延續品牌在千元級中階市場的競爭力。其中，UM750L Slim 搭載 AMD Ryzen 5 7545U 處理器，具備 6 核心 12 執行緒（2 個 Zen4 核心 + 4 個 Zen4c 核心），整合 Radeon 740M 顯示卡，並採用 LPDDR5-6400 記憶體。而 UM760 Plus 和 UM760 Slim 則搭載更強大的 AMD Ryzen 5 7640HS 處理器，擁有 6 個 Zen4 核心 12 執行緒，整合 Radeon 760M 顯示卡，支援雙通道 DDR5-5600 記憶體，所有型號均提供雙 PCIe 4.0 NVMe 接口、三顯示輸出、2.5G 網路卡與 WiFi 6E。

細節解析：外觀、接口與內部結構

在開箱檢視中，UM750L Slim 配備 65 瓦電源，而 UM760 Plus 和 UM760 Slim 則使用 120 瓦電源。特別是 UM760 Plus，還附帶了 M.2 PCIe 轉 Oculink 轉接配件。這三款迷你主機體積約 0.8 公升，尺寸相同，UM750L Slim 和 UM760 Plus 採用銀色塑膠外殼，UM760 Slim 則為深空黑。機身正面設有電源鍵、雙 USB 3.2 Type-A 接口和耳機/麥克風插孔，背面則包含 19V 電源接口、2.5G 網路埠、HDMI 2.1 接口、支援 PD 輸入與 DP 輸出的全功能 USB4 埠、DP 1.4 埠以及雙 USB 2.0 接口。UM760 Plus 的獨特之處在於其背面額外增加了 Oculink 外接接口。拆開底蓋後，可見靜音風扇和預裝的導熱矽膠墊。內部提供雙 DDR5 記憶體插槽 和兩個 PCIe 4.0 x4 NVMe 接口。UM750L Slim 內部則為板載的 16GB LPDDR5-6400 記憶體。

效能基準與穩定性測試

Minisforum 的迷你主機皆採用圖形化 BIOS。UM760 系列 的 BIOS 允許調整 VRAM 大小至最高 16GB，並可設定來電自動開機。其性能釋放預設為 60 瓦（降至 54 瓦），而 UM750L Slim 則預設為 40 瓦（降至 35 瓦）。在 AIDA64 的 FPU 單元壓力測試中，UM760 的 CPU 功耗穩定在 60 瓦（隨後降至 54 瓦），系統總功耗約 73 瓦，CPU 頻率維持 4.3 GHz，CPU 溫度最高達 92 度。UM750L Slim 的 CPU 功耗穩定在 40 瓦（隨後降至 35 瓦），系統總功耗約 54 瓦，CPU 頻率維持 4.7 GHz，CPU 溫度最高達 90 度。在多項 CPU 基準測試中，搭載 7640HS 的機型 在單核性能上普遍優於搭載 680M 內顯的 CPU，多核性能與自家的 UM690S (6900HX) 大致相當，並超越 Intel NUC 的 1360p。而 7545U 的單核表現也超越部分 680M 內顯機型，多核性能則超越 4800H、5600H、12450H 及 6600H。在魯大師評測中，UM760 Plus 總分達 1,349,093，CPU 達 810,466；UM750L Slim 總分 1,106,692，CPU 達 690,158。CoreMark 測試顯示 7640HS 接近 6900HX，7545U 則超越 12450H。

整合式顯示卡效能與 AI 應用

在遊戲性能方面，搭載 Radeon 740M (4 CU) 的 UM750L Slim 在 1080p 中畫質的《英雄聯盟》中可達約 100 FPS，在《原神》中約 40 FPS。搭載 Radeon 760M (8 CU) 的 UM760 系列 表現更佳，在 1080p 高畫質的《極限競速：地平線 5》中可達 80 FPS 左右，1080p 極高畫質的《地平線：零之曙光》中可穩定 70 FPS 以上。即使在 4K 中畫質的《英雄聯盟》中也能達到約 90 FPS，1080p 高畫質的《原神》則超過 50 FPS。令人驚訝的是，透過 1080p 自定義畫質、超採樣 50% 並開啟影格生成功能，760M 甚至能在《黑神話：悟空》的測試中達到 61 FPS。遊戲時的溫度監測顯示，CPU 最高 91.9 度，VRAM 最高 63.5 度，SSD 最高 44 度。3DMark 顯示 760M 內顯性能與 680M 內顯大致相當，7640HS 媲美 6900HX，而 7545U 略低。在 AI 大型模型測試中，7640HS 在 Snake Programming 達到 14.31 tok/s，7545U 為 11.42 tok/s。更令人振奮的是，將 7640HS 作為本地網路共享的大模型伺服器，即時網路翻譯速度可達 27 tok/s，這與搭載 780M 內顯 的迷你主機表現相差無幾，證明其在 AI 應用上的實用性。

總結與應用場景

作者總結，搭載 7640HS 處理器 的 UM760 Plus 和 UM760 Slim 迷你主機，不僅在綜合性能上表現出色，其整合式顯示卡也足以應付主流遊戲在適當設置下的需求。更重要的是，它們在 AI 大型模型運算，特別是作為本地網路翻譯伺服器方面，展現出不俗的實力，為追求高性價比且具備一定 AI 處理能力的用戶提供了新的選擇。

================================================

# Intro

Mingfan used to dominate the thousand-yuan price range. Launched the UM480XT. UM560XT. and UM690S. These three best-selling models. Initially covered from 1,000 yuan. Up to 2000 yuan. Mid-range mini PC market. Achieved quite impressive sales figures. Among them, the UM690S. I've never turned it off myself. Used for over two years. Never made a single mistake. The market for affordable thousand-yuan smartphones remains the most competitive. Minis has also launched its products. Three high-quality mini PCs. Hello everyone! I'm Lao Bai. Today we're taking a look at. these three mid-range, thousand-yuan mini PCs from Minifan. What are their differences and similarities? Featuring an Oculink interface. Silver-colored UM760 Plus. Deep space black UM760 Slim. 750L Slim with the same silver finish. These three are Minisforum's current models on sale. Mid-range thousand-yuan mini PC. Are you interested in these affordable mid-range models? Or would you rather spend a bit more. to get the Minisforum 8845HS. Or the flagship 8745HS model? These three mid-range models. are equipped with two different CPUs respectively. UM750L Slim. Equipped with Ryzen 5 7545U. UM760 Plus and UM760 Slim. Equipped with Ryzen 5 7640HS. Minifan UM750L Slim. Equipped with AMD Ryzen 5 7545U. 2 Zen4 cores and 4 Zen4c cores. A total of 6-core 12-thread mobile CPU. Integrated Radeon 740M GPU. LPDDR5 memory, 6400 MHz. Dual PCIe 4.0 x4 NVMe interfaces. Triple display output. 2.5G network card with WiFi 6E. Minisforum UM760 Slim and UM760 Plus. Equipped with AMD Ryzen 5 7640HS. 6 Zen4 cores, totaling 6 cores and 12 threads. Standard-power mobile CPU. Integrated Radeon 760M GPU. Dual-channel DDR5 memory, 5600 MHz. Two PCIe 4.0 x4 NVMe interfaces. Triple display output. 2.5G network card with WiFi 6E. UM760 Plus. An additional rear Oculink interface.

# 配件与接口

The outer packaging of three UM700 series mini PCs. Let's open the UM750L Slim first. The host and all accessories are here. Power cable. HDMI cable. Monitor backplate and screws. And replaceable feet pads. Manual. This DC small power supply is 19 volts, 3.42 amps. Total power output is 65 watts. Then turn on the UM760 Plus. Power cable, HDMI cable. Monitor back bracket and manual. They're all the same, aren't they? What makes the UM760 Plus model unique is. Includes an M.2 PCIe to Oculink adapter accessory. And the DC small power supply is 19 volts, 6.32 amps. Total power output of 120 watts. Finally, the one opened is the UM760 Slim. All accessories are identical. Adapter without Oculink. The DC small power supply is also 19 volts, 6.32 amps. Total power output of 120 watts. We placed the three mini PCs side by side. UM750L Slim. UM760 Plus. UM760 Slim. UM750L Slim and UM760 Plus. Both have a silver plastic finish. UM760 Slim. Features a dark black plastic exterior. All three have identical dimensions. Approximately 0.8 liters each. Pick up the UM750L Slim. The top features the Minisforum English logo. Minisforum. The other two models have it as well. Body interfaces. Front panel: Power button. Dual USB 3.2 Type-A ports.

Headphone/microphone jack. Rear panel: 19V power connector. 2.5G network port. Full-featured HDMI 2.1 interface. Supports PD input and DP output. Full-function USB4 port. DP 1.4 port. Dual USB 2.0 ports. Compared to the UM760 Plus. UM750L Slim. The interfaces are pretty much the same. But it has an additional Oculink external interface. UM760 Slim. The mini PC has a deep black plastic chassis. Apart from the color. All other interfaces are identical. It also has only one fewer Oculink interface. On both sides, bottom, and back of the mini PC. All have ventilation openings. Remove the four feet pads from the back. Remove the other 4 screws. Lift off the bottom cover from this gap. Let's take a look at the internal interface situation. The bottom cover has a silent fan. Pre-installed two silicone thermal pads. Dual DDR5 memory slots. Two sets of 2280 PCIe 4.0 x4 NVMe interfaces. One connected to SSD. Another set of empty slots. Supports Oculink interface connection. Remove the original NVMe SSD. MediaTek WiFi 6E wireless network card. Our UM760 Slim inside. Compared to this Plus model. it lacks the Oculink rear panel cutout. Similarly, opening up another UM750L Slim. The internal interfaces are also basically the same. There is no Oculink rear panel cutout either. But this one has 16GB built-in. LPDDR5 memory, 6400 MHz.

# 稳定度与性能测试

Minisforum's BIOS for all small form factor PCs. They are already graphical. Must give a positive review! BIOS home screen of two UM760s. Here is the memory and frequency. Here you can modify the VRAM size. Maximum 16GB. Set auto-start on power-on here. Set performance release here. The default is 60 watts down to 54 watts. We used the default settings. UM750L Slim. And the BIOS of the other two machines. It's the same. It can also set VRAM. It can also be set to automatically power on when receiving a call. However, the maximum performance release is. 40 to 35 watts under default mode. Stability is one of the issues we care about most. We open AIDA64. Running two UM760 small desktops. FFPU single-component stress test. CPU running directly at 60 watts. After 10 minutes and 25 seconds, it drops to 54 watts. System power consumption dropped from 81 watts to around 73 watts. CPU frequency remained stable at 4.3 GHz. We conducted a single-component stress test for 1 hour and 3 minutes. At an ambient temperature of 25 degrees Celsius. CPU temperature reaches up to 92 degrees. SSD maximum temperature is 52 degrees. While running the compact mini PC with UM750L Slim. During single-core FPU stress test on 7545U. The CPU runs at 40 watts. After 9 minutes and 10 seconds, it drops to 35 watts. The total system power consumption remains around 54 watts. The CPU frequency stabilizes at 4.7 GHz. We ran a single stress test for one hour. At room temperature of 25 degrees Celsius. The CPU temperature reached a maximum of 90 degrees. The SSD temperature peaked at 66 degrees. We'll be using the Minisforum UM760 and UM750. A total of three mini PCs. Ryzen 5 7640HS CPU. Transcoding with the Ryzen 5 7545U CPU. To see how it performs in practice. The final result was. the 7640HS achieving times of 743 seconds and 750 seconds. This performance. exceeded that of the UM690S with the 6900HX. It also surpasses the Intel NUC's 1360p. The 963 seconds of the 7545U. exceeds both the 12450H and 12650H. approaching the 6600H. CPU Z. 7640HS multi-threading.

Lower than 6900HS and 1360p. 7545U multi-threading. Over 12450H. Close to 6600H. Geekbench 5. 7640HS multi-core and R9 690HX. Very close. Single-core is significantly higher. Multi-core of the 7545U. Over 4800h, 5600h. Also over 12450h. Close to 6600h. Geekbench 6. 7640HS multi-core performance surpasses. R9 6900HX. also exceeds 1360p. 7545U also surpasses 6600H. Cinebench R23. Two 7640HS multi-core scores. Exceeding 1360p. Slightly behind the 6900HX. The 7545U surpasses the 6600H. Cinebench 2024. Dual 7640HS multi-core performance. Surpasses the 6900HX. 7545U close to 6600H. PassMark. Two 7640HS multi-threaded. Close to 6900HX. Over 1360p. 7545U is close to 6600H. Based on the above comparison. Minisforum UM760 Plus and Slim with 7640HS. Single-core performance generally exceeds. other CPUs with the 680M integrated graphics. Multi-core performance is roughly comparable to that of its own UM690S's 6900HX. about the same. Exceeds Intel NUC 1360p. Mingfan UM750L Slim's 7545U. Even single-core performance surpasses other 680m integrated graphics. Stronger CPU than small desktops with VEGA integrated graphics. Multi-core scores surpass those of the 4800H and 5600H. Also exceed the 12450H and 6600H. Then let's look at the Entertainment Master. UM760 Plus. Total score: 1,349,093. CPU score 810,466. UM750L Slim. Total score 1,106,692. CPU score 690,158. We have three mini PCs here. running openWRT test. In terms of CoreMark performance. 7640HS is close to 6900HX. 7545U surpasses 12450H.

# 图形与游戏性能

The integrated graphics of 7545U is 740M. Slightly weaker. It only has 4 CU. League of Legends: Medium settings at 1080p. The final team fight. Average around 100 frames per second. Genshin Impact: Medium quality at 1080p. During gameplay and combat, it drops to around 40 frames per second.

Integrated graphics of 7640HS vs. 760M integrated graphics. Slightly stronger. It has 8 CU. Horizon 5: 1080p High Quality. No anti-aliasing enabled. Around 80 frames in normal scenes. Over 60 frames in complex scenes.

Horizon Zero Dawn: 1080p ultra settings. Two times anti-aliasing enabled. Consistently over 70 frames throughout. Very impressive.

League of Legends: 4K medium settings. Final large-scale team battle averages around 90 FPS.

Genshin Impact: 1080p high graphics settings. Gameplay runs at over 50 FPS.

Black Myth: Wukong. Use the in-game performance testing tool. Custom graphics settings at 1080p. Set supersampling to 50. Enable frame generation. The final result is 61 frames per second. It's also possible, you know. Let's try it in practice.

This is the Radeon 760M integrated graphics. The gaming experience it brings us. First, let's take a look at the temperature during gaming. CPU temperature reaches up to 91.9 degrees Celsius. Memory used as VRAM reaches up to 63.5 degrees Celsius. SSD temperature peaks at 44 degrees Celsius. Let's take a look at the graphics score from 3DMark. We've turned the 3DMark data into a chart. The performance scores of the 760M integrated graphics. are about the same as those of the 680M integrated graphics. The 7640HS is comparable to the 6900HX. The 7545U with 4 CU is just a bit short. Next, we'll look at the 7640HS and 7545U. Ran AI large model tests respectively. Still Snake Programming. The final result was. 7640HS 14.31 tok/s. 7545U 11.42 tok/s. We also used the 7640HS. as a local network-shared large model server. Tested real-time network translation speed. Reached 27 tok/s unexpectedly. And the integrated graphics of the 780M mini PC. Not much difference. Still really usable, huh. In our previous episode, we introduced the mini PC. running practical local AI applications. Devices capable of real-time network translation. You can now add these two 7640HS mini PCs.

# 显示存储网络

Display output. Whether it's the UM750L Slim. or the UM760 Plus. and Um760 Slim. HDMI 2.1 ports of the three mini PCs. Capable of outputting up to 4K at 144Hz. 10-bit RGB video signal. Meet the full-featured HDM2.1 FRL standard. USB4 and DP ports on the three compact mini PCs. Capable of outputting up to 4K at 144Hz. 10-bit RGB display signal. Our monitor's DP interface. Can be overclocked up to 160 Hz. At this moment, these three compact desktop computers. Can output 4K at 160Hz. 10-bit RGB video signal. Three compact desktop computers connected to a Sony OLED TV. HDMI port supports 4K@120Hz output. 10-bit YCbCr 4:4:4 video signal. Radeon 760M and Radeon 740M integrated graphics. Video decoding capability. Both can hardware decode local 8K60 AV1 videos. YouTube 8K60fps AV1 video. Both can play smoothly. UM760 Plus. OEM SSD test. 6000 MB/s. A good speed for PCIe 4.0 x4. UM750L Slim. OEM SSD test. 4600 MB/s. The entry-level speed for PCIe 4.0 x4. USB4 ports on the three compact desktops. External Thunderbolt hard drive enclosure. 3100 MB/s. Good performance for a USB4 external storage. All three mini PCs use the Killer 2.5G network card. We'll use iperf3. Tested internal network performance. Whether single-thread upload and download. or multi-thread upload and download. all reached 2.35G. Bandwidth is fully utilized. This 2.5G network card has no compatibility issues.

# 功耗散热静音

Minisforum UM760 Plus and Slim. Equipped with Ryzen 5 7640HS. Performance release under Windows is. 60 to 54 watts. Here's our power consumption performance list for you. The highest never exceeded 95 watts. A 120W single-slot small power supply can handle it. When the ambient temperature is 25 degrees. CPU idle temperature: 28.8 degrees. SSD idle temperature: 28 degrees. Minisforum UM750L Slim. Equipped with Ryzen 5 7545U. Performance power delivery under Windows is. 40 to 35 watts. Here's our list showing the power consumption performance. Maximum power consumption does not exceed 60 watts. A 65-watt single-slot power supply is sufficient. When the ambient temperature is 25 degrees. CPU idle temperature: 37.6 degrees Celsius. SSD idle temperature: 33 degrees Celsius. Three small desktops productivity test. When CPU reaches 100%. Chassis noise is around 43 decibels. Only 38 decibels when placed next to the ear. All are quite quiet. The USB4 ports on the three small desktops. can all deliver 90W PD output to me. LG monitor with single-cable connectivity.

# 最后总结

Today we tested three different. Minisforum's mid-range sub-1,000-yuan mini PCs. Minisforum UM760 Slim, UM760 Plus. and the UM750L Slim. Both are equipped with 6-core 12-thread CPUs. The 7640HS features 6 Zen4 cores. The 7545U has 2 Zen4 and 4 Zen4C cores. In terms of performance, the two 7640HS units. Exactly the same. They approached what we tested before. The most powerful small desktop with integrated graphics of the 680M. CPU of Minisforum UM690S. 6900HX. Far exceeds the Intel NUC's 1360p. And the 7545U completely surpasses it. What we tested previously. The 4800H in the UM480xt. The 5600H in the UM560xt. Also surpasses the 12450H and 6600H. Graphics performance of the 760M integrated graphics. is also comparable to the 680M integrated graphics in the 6900HX. Its stronger point lies in the integrated graphics' hardware decoding capability. It can hardware decode AV1 video at 8K resolution and 60 frames per second. The 680M integrated graphics has no capability for 8K. The 740M integrated graphics on the 7545U. Can also hardware decode AV1 video at 8K resolution and 60 frames per second. These three compact desktops. All equipped with full-blooded HDM2.1 FRL interfaces. Can output high-refresh-rate 10-bit display signals. Full-function USB4 port. Both can achieve PD and DP display signals. One-stop solution. Three compact mini PCs. Running at their maximum capability. During 100% CPU testing. Background noise is only 38 decibels. Fully meets the standard for quietness. To sum up. Minisforum UM750L Slim. Equipped with Ryzen 5 7545U. Performance boost of 40 to 35 watts.

Far exceeds the previous ones. 4800h, 5600h. Also over 12450h. and 6600h. Excellent cooling and quiet operation. Full-featured USB4 with full power. Supports PD power delivery and DP signal output. Perfect interface compatibility. Based on its performance characteristics. I think it's the most suitable among the three mini PCs. for entry-level office use. and home HTPC. Don't waste the full-featured HDMI 2.1 interface! Minisforum UM760 Slim and Plus. Both equipped with Ryzen 5 7640HS. Performance power delivery under Windows is. 60 to 54 watts. Comparable to the 6900HX. Graphics gaming performance is also similar. Excellent cooling and quiet operation. Also features full-function USB4. Perfect interface compatibility. UM7604 Slim. Perfectly suitable as a compact desktop for mid-range office use. and a full-fledged home theater HTPC experience. While the UM760 Plus. also features an Oculink interface. Reached our heart's desire. Super Grand Slam interface standard. It delivers excellent performance in the UM760 Slim for office use. And a full home theater experience. Plus 3A gaming experience added. This is a fully-featured mini PC. Based on their performance, price, and interface configuration. I evaluated the UM760 Plus. Give a "strongly recommended" rating. Rate the other two as "recommended" Alright! That's it for today. This is Lao Bai! Thank you all for watching! Goodbye!

item.title: 铝合金美颜！雷神MIX新品 i7 13620H 迷你主机全面评测！65W性能释放！
item.itunes:title: 铝合金美颜！雷神MIX新品 i7 13620H 迷你主机全面评测！65W性能释放！
item.itunes:author: jack stone
item.itunes:summary:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NwhnO0s6FUA

值得閱讀的理由

  • 詳細介紹雷神MIX迷你主機的外觀、尺寸、內部設計，以及其搭載的Intel i7-13620H處理器的核心規格。
  • 提供Intel i7-13620H處理器在多項基準測試、實際應用（如影片轉碼）和遊戲中的詳細效能數據，並與其他處理器進行比較。
  • 深入探討迷你主機在散熱穩定性、功耗表現、噪音控制、顯示輸出能力和儲存網路速度等方面的綜合表現，並給出清晰的優缺點總結與使用建議。

摘要

引言與設計亮點

這段影片由作者介紹了一款精巧迷人的小型桌上型電腦——雷神MIX迷你主機。這款主機採用銀色鋁合金機身，尺寸僅為128 × 128 × 36毫米，體積小於0.6公升，外觀設計極具吸引力。它搭載了Intel i7-13620H移動版高效能CPU，具備10核心16執行緒，並配備Intel UHD Graphics (64 EU)。該主機支援雙通道DDR4 3200MHz記憶體，擁有雙M.2 PCIe 4.0 x4插槽，並提供三重顯示輸出、Gigabit LAN和WiFi 6連線能力。影片中展示的是一個開發原型機，配備19V、6.32A的120瓦電源供應器。

介面配置與內部結構

影片詳細展示了雷神MIX迷你主機的介面配置。前面板包含一個支援10Gbps資料與顯示輸出的Type-C接口、兩個USB 3.2 Type-A接口、一個音訊接口及電源開關。背面則有HDMI 2.0埠、DP 1.4埠、Gigabit網路埠、四個USB 3.2 Type-A接口和一個19V電源接頭。主機的側面、底部和後部都設有散熱開孔。作者接著進行了拆解，透過移除底部螺絲和支架，展示了內部結構，包括一個大型的CPU散熱風扇，頂蓋上為NVMe固態硬碟散熱的矽膠散熱墊，以及主機板上的雙DDR4記憶體插槽（其中一個已安裝32GB DDR4 3200MHz記憶體）和雙M.2 PCIe 4.0 x4 NVMe SSD插槽（一個已使用，另一個閒置），以及Wi-Fi 6無線網卡。

效能模式與系統穩定性

在BIOS設定中，作者展示了效能提升選項，包括效能模式（65瓦）、平衡模式（54瓦）和靜音模式（45瓦）。本次測試選用65瓦的效能模式。針對主機的穩定性，作者使用AIDA64進行了FPU單元件壓力測試。在測試135秒後，CPU功耗從70瓦穩定下降到65瓦，系統總功耗從104瓦穩定在97瓦，CPU頻率平均維持在3.5 GHz。經過長達1小時4分鐘的連續壓力測試，13620H的功耗穩定保持在65瓦，最高CPU溫度達到96攝氏度，SSD溫度則為50攝氏度，顯示其在高效能模式下的穩定散熱能力。

多項基準測試結果

影片中展示了i7-13620H在多個基準測試中的表現：

  • CPU-Z：多執行緒6146.2，單執行緒676.8，多執行緒分數超越1360P和6900HX。
  • Geekbench 5：多核心9144，單核心1610。
  • Geekbench 6：多核心9610，單核心2221。
  • Cinebench R23：多核心13,540，單核心1564，多核心分數高於1360P。
  • Cinebench 2024：多核心745，單核心97，高於6900HX。
  • PassMark：多執行緒24,129，單執行緒3,505。

整體而言，13620H在65瓦效能釋放下，其效能表現接近於1360P和6900HX。在魯大師綜合跑分中，總分為1,034,946，CPU得分519,000。OpenWRT測試中，CoreMark得分360,537，超越1360P和13500H。

實用效能：轉碼、遊戲與顯示輸出

在實際應用方面，使用雷神MIX迷你主機的i7-13620H CPU進行影片轉碼，最終耗時14分鐘32秒（872秒），表現優於1360P。在遊戲測試中，由於搭載的是64EU的UHD整合式顯示卡，在1080p中等畫質下，遊玩《英雄聯盟》大型團戰平均幀率約為110 FPS，而《原神》則在30 FPS左右。顯示輸出方面，HDMI埠支援4K@60Hz (8-bit RGB)，Type-C和DP接口則支援最高4K@144Hz (8-bit RGB)，甚至在超頻後可達4K@160Hz。作者還展示了其卓越的視訊解碼能力，能夠流暢硬體解碼本地8K60fps AV1影片及YouTube上的8K60fps AV1影片。

儲存、網路與功耗噪音表現

儲存效能方面，原廠NVMe SSD測試讀寫速度約為5300 MB/s，符合PCIe 4.0 x4的典型水準，前置Type-C接口儲存效能約為1000 MB/s。無線網路採用Realtek 8852BE WiFi 6網卡，測得速度達到740 Mbps。功耗方面，CPU最大功耗為105瓦，最大閒置功耗為25.5瓦，120瓦DC電源供應器綽綽有餘。作者指出，由於是工程原型機，BIOS中的C States未啟用，導致待機功耗略高，但最終產品應會統一配置。在環境溫度25度下，CPU閒置溫度53度，SSD閒置溫度42度。噪音控制方面，CPU滿載時機身噪音約54分貝，貼近耳朵測量為45分貝；在平衡模式下，機身噪音為48分貝，貼近耳朵測量為38分貝，表現相當安靜。

總結與建議

作者總結指出，雷神MIX迷你主機搭載的Intel i7-13620H在工廠設定65瓦效能下，其效能釋放接近i7-1360P和R9 6900HX。該主機具備安靜且穩定的散熱，提供三個4K顯示輸出接口，擁有極高的顏值和精巧便攜的設計。其唯一可改善的缺點是僅配置Gigabit乙太網路埠，建議應升級至2.5G。總體而言，這款第13代酷睿移動標準電壓迷你PC工藝精湛，外觀精美，是辦公用途和家用HTPC的理想選擇。影片最後，作者向觀眾道別。

================================================

# Intro

Another silver aluminum alloy small desktop unit. Stunningly attractive! 128 × 128 × 36. With a volume of less than 0.6 liters. So compact. This device features an i7 mobile high-performance CPU. Do you like this design? Hello everyone! I'm Lao Bai. Today we will introduce to you. Equipped with Intel i7-13620H. High-performance mini desktop. New Thunderobot MIX. Thunderobot MIX 2025. It is equipped with Intel i7-13620H. 10-core 16-thread standard-power mobile CPU. Intel UHD graphics with 64 EU. Dual-channel DDR4 memory, 3200 megahertz. Dual M.2 PCIe 4.0 x4 slots. Triple display output. Gigabit LAN with WiFi 6.

# 配件与接口

We are using a development prototype. Besides the host unit,. this is a 19-volt, 6.32-amp power supply. Total power output of 120 watts.

The mini PC has a silver aluminum alloy chassis. Brand English logo in the lower left corner. Very beautiful.

Body interfaces. Front panel: Type C data and display interface. 10G Bps. Dual USB 3.2 Type-A ports. Audio interface. Power on/off button.

Rear panel: HDMI 2.0 port. DP 1.4 port. Gigabit network port. 4 USB 3.2 Type-A ports. 19V power connector.

Both sides, bottom, and rear. All have ventilation openings.

Remove the four screws from the foot pads. Gently pry off the bottom cover. Note: The back cover and bottom cover are connected together.

A large CPU cooling fan. We need to keep disassembling. Remove the four screws at the corners. Remove the support brackets on both sides.

We've taken out the motherboard.

There is a silicone heat sink pad on the top cover. Used for cooling NVMe SSDs. Flip the motherboard. Let's take a look at all the available interfaces.

Dual-channel DDR4 3200 MHz memory. One M.2 PCIe 4.0 x4 NVMe SSD. The other M.2 PCIe 4.0 x4 slot is vacant. Remove the NVMe SSD. Below is the Wi-Fi 6 wireless card.

# 稳定度与性能测试

BIOS can see it. 32GB DDR4 3200MHz memory installed.

Here are performance boost options. Performance mode: 65 watts. Balanced mode 54 watts. Silent mode 45 watts. We select performance mode 65 watts. Performing today's test.

Here you can set up call auto-start.

Stability is one of the issues we care about most. We open AIDA64. Run the FPU single-component stress test. CPU power consumption after 135 seconds. drops steadily from 70 watts to 65 watts. maximum system power consumption reaches 104 watts. drops and stabilizes at 97 watts. CPU frequency reduced to an average of 3.5 GHz. We have been stress-testing the CPU for 1 hour and 4 minutes continuously. The power consumption of the 13620H has remained at 65 watts consistently. Maximum CPU temperature reached 96 degrees. SSD temperature up to 50 degrees Celsius.

We'll use the Thunder God MIX mini PC's. i7-13620H CPU for transcoding. To see how it performs in practice. The final result is 14 minutes and 32 seconds. A total of 872 seconds. Higher than the 1360P we tested. Slightly lower than the 6900HX. CPU Z Multi-thread: 6146.2. Single-thread: 676.8. Multi-thread score exceeds that of the 1360P. And the 6900HX. Geekbench 5 Multi-core: 9144. Single-core: 1610. Multi-core score lower than 1360P. Slightly higher than 6900HX. Geekbench 6 Multi-core 9610. Single-core 2221. Lower than 1360P. Cinebench R23 Multi-core 13,540. Single-core: 1564. Multi-core score above 1360P. Lower than 6900HX.

Cinebench 2024 Multi-core: 745. Single-core: 97. Higher than the 6900HX. But lower than its own MIX Pro's 125H. PassMark multi-threaded: 24,129. Single-threaded: 3,505. Slightly lower than the 1360P. A bit higher than the XiaoXin 13500H. Overall,. The 13620H delivering 65W performance. Approaching the performance of the 1360P and 6900HX. Next, let's look at the Entertainment Master. Total score: 1,034,946. CPU score: 519,000. We also ran the openWRT test on the i7-13620H. running openWRT test. AES 758,238. chacha20 412,618. CoreMark 360,537. In terms of CoreMark performance. It exceeds 1360P and 13500H. Lower than 6900HX.

# 图形与游戏性能

Now let's play a game. League of Legends: Medium settings at 1080p. Finally, the average frame rate during the large team fight is around 110 FPS.

Genshin Impact: Medium quality at 1080p. Run and fight. Around 30 frames per second. This is the UHD integrated graphics of the 64EU processor. The gaming experience it brings us.

# 显示存储网络

Display output. HDMI port supports up to 4K@60Hz. 8-bit RGB display signal output. Type C and DP interfaces output DP signals. Supports up to 4K@144Hz. 8-bit RGB display signal output. Our monitor supports the DP interface. Overclocked to 160 Hz. Type C and DP ports after overclocking. Capable of supporting 4K at 160 Hz. 8-bit RGB display signal output. Sony OLED TV. Connect the HDMI cable. Display output of 4K60Hz 8-bit RGB signal. Let's take a look at the strengths of Intel UHD integrated graphics. Video decoding. It can hardware decode local 8K60fps AV1 videos at the highest level.

YouTube 8K60fps AV1 video. Still plays smoothly.

Original factory NVMe SSD test. 5300 MB/s. Typical performance level for PCIe 4.0 x4. Front-facing Type-C interface storage performance test. 1000 MB/s. WiFi Test. This time it's Realtek 8852BE. WiFi6 Wireless Network Card. Ran up to 740 Mbps. It's like my wireless network environment. A decent type.

# 功耗散热静音

Thunderobot MIX Mini PC. Equipped with 13th Gen Intel Core i7 CPU. 13620H. 65W performance boost. Power consumption performance under Windows. We're showing our list for everyone to see. Maximum CPU power consumption: 105 watts. Maximum idle power consumption: 25.5 watts. A 120-watt DC power supply is sufficient. This unit is an engineering prototype. The C States in BIOS are not enabled. Therefore, the standby power consumption is slightly higher. Final products should have this setting uniformly configured at factory. When the ambient temperature is 25 degrees. CPU idle temperature is 53 degrees. SSD idle temperature is 42 degrees.

This small desktop computer's CPU under full load. Body noise around 54 decibels. Reduced to 45 decibels when held next to the ear.

We conducted a burn-in test in balanced mode. Body noise at 48 decibels. 38 decibels when retracted next to the ear. This is considered quiet. Thunder God MIX Mini PC.

# 最后总结

Equipped with Intel CPU i7-13620H. Factory-set performance release of 65W. Performance is likely close to. 1360P and 6900HX. In performance mode. Single FPU stress test maximum temperature: 96 degrees Celsius. Noise level under full load: 45 decibels. Stable cooling and quiet operation. Compact and portable design. Exquisite craftsmanship. Beautiful design. Very high visual appeal. The device has three 4K display output ports on its body. The downside? Definitely a gigabit Ethernet port. It should be configured with 2.5G. To sum up. 65W performance output at factory. Close to i7-1360P and R9 6900HX. Quiet, stable cooling. Three display output interfaces available. Very high in appearance, extremely compact. 13th Gen Core mobile standard-voltage mini PC. Craftsmanship is quite refined. Perfect tool for office use and home HTPC. Alright! That's it for today. This is Lao Bai! Thank you all for watching! Goodbye!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NwhnO0s6FUA

值得閱讀的理由

  • 詳細介紹雷神MIX迷你主機的外觀、尺寸、內部設計，以及其搭載的Intel i7-13620H處理器的核心規格。
  • 提供Intel i7-13620H處理器在多項基準測試、實際應用（如影片轉碼）和遊戲中的詳細效能數據，並與其他處理器進行比較。
  • 深入探討迷你主機在散熱穩定性、功耗表現、噪音控制、顯示輸出能力和儲存網路速度等方面的綜合表現，並給出清晰的優缺點總結與使用建議。

摘要

引言與設計亮點

這段影片由作者介紹了一款精巧迷人的小型桌上型電腦——雷神MIX迷你主機。這款主機採用銀色鋁合金機身，尺寸僅為128 × 128 × 36毫米，體積小於0.6公升，外觀設計極具吸引力。它搭載了Intel i7-13620H移動版高效能CPU，具備10核心16執行緒，並配備Intel UHD Graphics (64 EU)。該主機支援雙通道DDR4 3200MHz記憶體，擁有雙M.2 PCIe 4.0 x4插槽，並提供三重顯示輸出、Gigabit LAN和WiFi 6連線能力。影片中展示的是一個開發原型機，配備19V、6.32A的120瓦電源供應器。

介面配置與內部結構

影片詳細展示了雷神MIX迷你主機的介面配置。前面板包含一個支援10Gbps資料與顯示輸出的Type-C接口、兩個USB 3.2 Type-A接口、一個音訊接口及電源開關。背面則有HDMI 2.0埠、DP 1.4埠、Gigabit網路埠、四個USB 3.2 Type-A接口和一個19V電源接頭。主機的側面、底部和後部都設有散熱開孔。作者接著進行了拆解，透過移除底部螺絲和支架，展示了內部結構，包括一個大型的CPU散熱風扇，頂蓋上為NVMe固態硬碟散熱的矽膠散熱墊，以及主機板上的雙DDR4記憶體插槽（其中一個已安裝32GB DDR4 3200MHz記憶體）和雙M.2 PCIe 4.0 x4 NVMe SSD插槽（一個已使用，另一個閒置），以及Wi-Fi 6無線網卡。

效能模式與系統穩定性

在BIOS設定中，作者展示了效能提升選項，包括效能模式（65瓦）、平衡模式（54瓦）和靜音模式（45瓦）。本次測試選用65瓦的效能模式。針對主機的穩定性，作者使用AIDA64進行了FPU單元件壓力測試。在測試135秒後，CPU功耗從70瓦穩定下降到65瓦，系統總功耗從104瓦穩定在97瓦，CPU頻率平均維持在3.5 GHz。經過長達1小時4分鐘的連續壓力測試，13620H的功耗穩定保持在65瓦，最高CPU溫度達到96攝氏度，SSD溫度則為50攝氏度，顯示其在高效能模式下的穩定散熱能力。

多項基準測試結果

影片中展示了i7-13620H在多個基準測試中的表現：

  • CPU-Z：多執行緒6146.2，單執行緒676.8，多執行緒分數超越1360P和6900HX。
  • Geekbench 5：多核心9144，單核心1610。
  • Geekbench 6：多核心9610，單核心2221。
  • Cinebench R23：多核心13,540，單核心1564，多核心分數高於1360P。
  • Cinebench 2024：多核心745，單核心97，高於6900HX。
  • PassMark：多執行緒24,129，單執行緒3,505。

整體而言，13620H在65瓦效能釋放下，其效能表現接近於1360P和6900HX。在魯大師綜合跑分中，總分為1,034,946，CPU得分519,000。OpenWRT測試中，CoreMark得分360,537，超越1360P和13500H。

實用效能：轉碼、遊戲與顯示輸出

在實際應用方面，使用雷神MIX迷你主機的i7-13620H CPU進行影片轉碼，最終耗時14分鐘32秒（872秒），表現優於1360P。在遊戲測試中，由於搭載的是64EU的UHD整合式顯示卡，在1080p中等畫質下，遊玩《英雄聯盟》大型團戰平均幀率約為110 FPS，而《原神》則在30 FPS左右。顯示輸出方面，HDMI埠支援4K@60Hz (8-bit RGB)，Type-C和DP接口則支援最高4K@144Hz (8-bit RGB)，甚至在超頻後可達4K@160Hz。作者還展示了其卓越的視訊解碼能力，能夠流暢硬體解碼本地8K60fps AV1影片及YouTube上的8K60fps AV1影片。

儲存、網路與功耗噪音表現

儲存效能方面，原廠NVMe SSD測試讀寫速度約為5300 MB/s，符合PCIe 4.0 x4的典型水準，前置Type-C接口儲存效能約為1000 MB/s。無線網路採用Realtek 8852BE WiFi 6網卡，測得速度達到740 Mbps。功耗方面，CPU最大功耗為105瓦，最大閒置功耗為25.5瓦，120瓦DC電源供應器綽綽有餘。作者指出，由於是工程原型機，BIOS中的C States未啟用，導致待機功耗略高，但最終產品應會統一配置。在環境溫度25度下，CPU閒置溫度53度，SSD閒置溫度42度。噪音控制方面，CPU滿載時機身噪音約54分貝，貼近耳朵測量為45分貝；在平衡模式下，機身噪音為48分貝，貼近耳朵測量為38分貝，表現相當安靜。

總結與建議

作者總結指出，雷神MIX迷你主機搭載的Intel i7-13620H在工廠設定65瓦效能下，其效能釋放接近i7-1360P和R9 6900HX。該主機具備安靜且穩定的散熱，提供三個4K顯示輸出接口，擁有極高的顏值和精巧便攜的設計。其唯一可改善的缺點是僅配置Gigabit乙太網路埠，建議應升級至2.5G。總體而言，這款第13代酷睿移動標準電壓迷你PC工藝精湛，外觀精美，是辦公用途和家用HTPC的理想選擇。影片最後，作者向觀眾道別。

================================================

# Intro

Another silver aluminum alloy small desktop unit. Stunningly attractive! 128 × 128 × 36. With a volume of less than 0.6 liters. So compact. This device features an i7 mobile high-performance CPU. Do you like this design? Hello everyone! I'm Lao Bai. Today we will introduce to you. Equipped with Intel i7-13620H. High-performance mini desktop. New Thunderobot MIX. Thunderobot MIX 2025. It is equipped with Intel i7-13620H. 10-core 16-thread standard-power mobile CPU. Intel UHD graphics with 64 EU. Dual-channel DDR4 memory, 3200 megahertz. Dual M.2 PCIe 4.0 x4 slots. Triple display output. Gigabit LAN with WiFi 6.

# 配件与接口

We are using a development prototype. Besides the host unit,. this is a 19-volt, 6.32-amp power supply. Total power output of 120 watts.

The mini PC has a silver aluminum alloy chassis. Brand English logo in the lower left corner. Very beautiful.

Body interfaces. Front panel: Type C data and display interface. 10G Bps. Dual USB 3.2 Type-A ports. Audio interface. Power on/off button.

Rear panel: HDMI 2.0 port. DP 1.4 port. Gigabit network port. 4 USB 3.2 Type-A ports. 19V power connector.

Both sides, bottom, and rear. All have ventilation openings.

Remove the four screws from the foot pads. Gently pry off the bottom cover. Note: The back cover and bottom cover are connected together.

A large CPU cooling fan. We need to keep disassembling. Remove the four screws at the corners. Remove the support brackets on both sides.

We've taken out the motherboard.

There is a silicone heat sink pad on the top cover. Used for cooling NVMe SSDs. Flip the motherboard. Let's take a look at all the available interfaces.

Dual-channel DDR4 3200 MHz memory. One M.2 PCIe 4.0 x4 NVMe SSD. The other M.2 PCIe 4.0 x4 slot is vacant. Remove the NVMe SSD. Below is the Wi-Fi 6 wireless card.

# 稳定度与性能测试

BIOS can see it. 32GB DDR4 3200MHz memory installed.

Here are performance boost options. Performance mode: 65 watts. Balanced mode 54 watts. Silent mode 45 watts. We select performance mode 65 watts. Performing today's test.

Here you can set up call auto-start.

Stability is one of the issues we care about most. We open AIDA64. Run the FPU single-component stress test. CPU power consumption after 135 seconds. drops steadily from 70 watts to 65 watts. maximum system power consumption reaches 104 watts. drops and stabilizes at 97 watts. CPU frequency reduced to an average of 3.5 GHz. We have been stress-testing the CPU for 1 hour and 4 minutes continuously. The power consumption of the 13620H has remained at 65 watts consistently. Maximum CPU temperature reached 96 degrees. SSD temperature up to 50 degrees Celsius.

We'll use the Thunder God MIX mini PC's. i7-13620H CPU for transcoding. To see how it performs in practice. The final result is 14 minutes and 32 seconds. A total of 872 seconds. Higher than the 1360P we tested. Slightly lower than the 6900HX. CPU Z Multi-thread: 6146.2. Single-thread: 676.8. Multi-thread score exceeds that of the 1360P. And the 6900HX. Geekbench 5 Multi-core: 9144. Single-core: 1610. Multi-core score lower than 1360P. Slightly higher than 6900HX. Geekbench 6 Multi-core 9610. Single-core 2221. Lower than 1360P. Cinebench R23 Multi-core 13,540. Single-core: 1564. Multi-core score above 1360P. Lower than 6900HX.

Cinebench 2024 Multi-core: 745. Single-core: 97. Higher than the 6900HX. But lower than its own MIX Pro's 125H. PassMark multi-threaded: 24,129. Single-threaded: 3,505. Slightly lower than the 1360P. A bit higher than the XiaoXin 13500H. Overall,. The 13620H delivering 65W performance. Approaching the performance of the 1360P and 6900HX. Next, let's look at the Entertainment Master. Total score: 1,034,946. CPU score: 519,000. We also ran the openWRT test on the i7-13620H. running openWRT test. AES 758,238. chacha20 412,618. CoreMark 360,537. In terms of CoreMark performance. It exceeds 1360P and 13500H. Lower than 6900HX.

# 图形与游戏性能

Now let's play a game. League of Legends: Medium settings at 1080p. Finally, the average frame rate during the large team fight is around 110 FPS.

Genshin Impact: Medium quality at 1080p. Run and fight. Around 30 frames per second. This is the UHD integrated graphics of the 64EU processor. The gaming experience it brings us.

# 显示存储网络

Display output. HDMI port supports up to 4K@60Hz. 8-bit RGB display signal output. Type C and DP interfaces output DP signals. Supports up to 4K@144Hz. 8-bit RGB display signal output. Our monitor supports the DP interface. Overclocked to 160 Hz. Type C and DP ports after overclocking. Capable of supporting 4K at 160 Hz. 8-bit RGB display signal output. Sony OLED TV. Connect the HDMI cable. Display output of 4K60Hz 8-bit RGB signal. Let's take a look at the strengths of Intel UHD integrated graphics. Video decoding. It can hardware decode local 8K60fps AV1 videos at the highest level.

YouTube 8K60fps AV1 video. Still plays smoothly.

Original factory NVMe SSD test. 5300 MB/s. Typical performance level for PCIe 4.0 x4. Front-facing Type-C interface storage performance test. 1000 MB/s. WiFi Test. This time it's Realtek 8852BE. WiFi6 Wireless Network Card. Ran up to 740 Mbps. It's like my wireless network environment. A decent type.

# 功耗散热静音

Thunderobot MIX Mini PC. Equipped with 13th Gen Intel Core i7 CPU. 13620H. 65W performance boost. Power consumption performance under Windows. We're showing our list for everyone to see. Maximum CPU power consumption: 105 watts. Maximum idle power consumption: 25.5 watts. A 120-watt DC power supply is sufficient. This unit is an engineering prototype. The C States in BIOS are not enabled. Therefore, the standby power consumption is slightly higher. Final products should have this setting uniformly configured at factory. When the ambient temperature is 25 degrees. CPU idle temperature is 53 degrees. SSD idle temperature is 42 degrees.

This small desktop computer's CPU under full load. Body noise around 54 decibels. Reduced to 45 decibels when held next to the ear.

We conducted a burn-in test in balanced mode. Body noise at 48 decibels. 38 decibels when retracted next to the ear. This is considered quiet. Thunder God MIX Mini PC.

# 最后总结

Equipped with Intel CPU i7-13620H. Factory-set performance release of 65W. Performance is likely close to. 1360P and 6900HX. In performance mode. Single FPU stress test maximum temperature: 96 degrees Celsius. Noise level under full load: 45 decibels. Stable cooling and quiet operation. Compact and portable design. Exquisite craftsmanship. Beautiful design. Very high visual appeal. The device has three 4K display output ports on its body. The downside? Definitely a gigabit Ethernet port. It should be configured with 2.5G. To sum up. 65W performance output at factory. Close to i7-1360P and R9 6900HX. Quiet, stable cooling. Three display output interfaces available. Very high in appearance, extremely compact. 13th Gen Core mobile standard-voltage mini PC. Craftsmanship is quite refined. Perfect tool for office use and home HTPC. Alright! That's it for today. This is Lao Bai! Thank you all for watching! Goodbye!

=============

item.content:encoded:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NwhnO0s6FUA

值得閱讀的理由

  • 詳細介紹雷神MIX迷你主機的外觀、尺寸、內部設計，以及其搭載的Intel i7-13620H處理器的核心規格。
  • 提供Intel i7-13620H處理器在多項基準測試、實際應用（如影片轉碼）和遊戲中的詳細效能數據，並與其他處理器進行比較。
  • 深入探討迷你主機在散熱穩定性、功耗表現、噪音控制、顯示輸出能力和儲存網路速度等方面的綜合表現，並給出清晰的優缺點總結與使用建議。

摘要

引言與設計亮點

這段影片由作者介紹了一款精巧迷人的小型桌上型電腦——雷神MIX迷你主機。這款主機採用銀色鋁合金機身，尺寸僅為128 × 128 × 36毫米，體積小於0.6公升，外觀設計極具吸引力。它搭載了Intel i7-13620H移動版高效能CPU，具備10核心16執行緒，並配備Intel UHD Graphics (64 EU)。該主機支援雙通道DDR4 3200MHz記憶體，擁有雙M.2 PCIe 4.0 x4插槽，並提供三重顯示輸出、Gigabit LAN和WiFi 6連線能力。影片中展示的是一個開發原型機，配備19V、6.32A的120瓦電源供應器。

介面配置與內部結構

影片詳細展示了雷神MIX迷你主機的介面配置。前面板包含一個支援10Gbps資料與顯示輸出的Type-C接口、兩個USB 3.2 Type-A接口、一個音訊接口及電源開關。背面則有HDMI 2.0埠、DP 1.4埠、Gigabit網路埠、四個USB 3.2 Type-A接口和一個19V電源接頭。主機的側面、底部和後部都設有散熱開孔。作者接著進行了拆解，透過移除底部螺絲和支架，展示了內部結構，包括一個大型的CPU散熱風扇，頂蓋上為NVMe固態硬碟散熱的矽膠散熱墊，以及主機板上的雙DDR4記憶體插槽（其中一個已安裝32GB DDR4 3200MHz記憶體）和雙M.2 PCIe 4.0 x4 NVMe SSD插槽（一個已使用，另一個閒置），以及Wi-Fi 6無線網卡。

效能模式與系統穩定性

在BIOS設定中，作者展示了效能提升選項，包括效能模式（65瓦）、平衡模式（54瓦）和靜音模式（45瓦）。本次測試選用65瓦的效能模式。針對主機的穩定性，作者使用AIDA64進行了FPU單元件壓力測試。在測試135秒後，CPU功耗從70瓦穩定下降到65瓦，系統總功耗從104瓦穩定在97瓦，CPU頻率平均維持在3.5 GHz。經過長達1小時4分鐘的連續壓力測試，13620H的功耗穩定保持在65瓦，最高CPU溫度達到96攝氏度，SSD溫度則為50攝氏度，顯示其在高效能模式下的穩定散熱能力。

多項基準測試結果

影片中展示了i7-13620H在多個基準測試中的表現：

  • CPU-Z：多執行緒6146.2，單執行緒676.8，多執行緒分數超越1360P和6900HX。
  • Geekbench 5：多核心9144，單核心1610。
  • Geekbench 6：多核心9610，單核心2221。
  • Cinebench R23：多核心13,540，單核心1564，多核心分數高於1360P。
  • Cinebench 2024：多核心745，單核心97，高於6900HX。
  • PassMark：多執行緒24,129，單執行緒3,505。

整體而言，13620H在65瓦效能釋放下，其效能表現接近於1360P和6900HX。在魯大師綜合跑分中，總分為1,034,946，CPU得分519,000。OpenWRT測試中，CoreMark得分360,537，超越1360P和13500H。

實用效能：轉碼、遊戲與顯示輸出

在實際應用方面，使用雷神MIX迷你主機的i7-13620H CPU進行影片轉碼，最終耗時14分鐘32秒（872秒），表現優於1360P。在遊戲測試中，由於搭載的是64EU的UHD整合式顯示卡，在1080p中等畫質下，遊玩《英雄聯盟》大型團戰平均幀率約為110 FPS，而《原神》則在30 FPS左右。顯示輸出方面，HDMI埠支援4K@60Hz (8-bit RGB)，Type-C和DP接口則支援最高4K@144Hz (8-bit RGB)，甚至在超頻後可達4K@160Hz。作者還展示了其卓越的視訊解碼能力，能夠流暢硬體解碼本地8K60fps AV1影片及YouTube上的8K60fps AV1影片。

儲存、網路與功耗噪音表現

儲存效能方面，原廠NVMe SSD測試讀寫速度約為5300 MB/s，符合PCIe 4.0 x4的典型水準，前置Type-C接口儲存效能約為1000 MB/s。無線網路採用Realtek 8852BE WiFi 6網卡，測得速度達到740 Mbps。功耗方面，CPU最大功耗為105瓦，最大閒置功耗為25.5瓦，120瓦DC電源供應器綽綽有餘。作者指出，由於是工程原型機，BIOS中的C States未啟用，導致待機功耗略高，但最終產品應會統一配置。在環境溫度25度下，CPU閒置溫度53度，SSD閒置溫度42度。噪音控制方面，CPU滿載時機身噪音約54分貝，貼近耳朵測量為45分貝；在平衡模式下，機身噪音為48分貝，貼近耳朵測量為38分貝，表現相當安靜。

總結與建議

作者總結指出，雷神MIX迷你主機搭載的Intel i7-13620H在工廠設定65瓦效能下，其效能釋放接近i7-1360P和R9 6900HX。該主機具備安靜且穩定的散熱，提供三個4K顯示輸出接口，擁有極高的顏值和精巧便攜的設計。其唯一可改善的缺點是僅配置Gigabit乙太網路埠，建議應升級至2.5G。總體而言，這款第13代酷睿移動標準電壓迷你PC工藝精湛，外觀精美，是辦公用途和家用HTPC的理想選擇。影片最後，作者向觀眾道別。

================================================

# Intro

Another silver aluminum alloy small desktop unit. Stunningly attractive! 128 × 128 × 36. With a volume of less than 0.6 liters. So compact. This device features an i7 mobile high-performance CPU. Do you like this design? Hello everyone! I'm Lao Bai. Today we will introduce to you. Equipped with Intel i7-13620H. High-performance mini desktop. New Thunderobot MIX. Thunderobot MIX 2025. It is equipped with Intel i7-13620H. 10-core 16-thread standard-power mobile CPU. Intel UHD graphics with 64 EU. Dual-channel DDR4 memory, 3200 megahertz. Dual M.2 PCIe 4.0 x4 slots. Triple display output. Gigabit LAN with WiFi 6.

# 配件与接口

We are using a development prototype. Besides the host unit,. this is a 19-volt, 6.32-amp power supply. Total power output of 120 watts.

The mini PC has a silver aluminum alloy chassis. Brand English logo in the lower left corner. Very beautiful.

Body interfaces. Front panel: Type C data and display interface. 10G Bps. Dual USB 3.2 Type-A ports. Audio interface. Power on/off button.

Rear panel: HDMI 2.0 port. DP 1.4 port. Gigabit network port. 4 USB 3.2 Type-A ports. 19V power connector.

Both sides, bottom, and rear. All have ventilation openings.

Remove the four screws from the foot pads. Gently pry off the bottom cover. Note: The back cover and bottom cover are connected together.

A large CPU cooling fan. We need to keep disassembling. Remove the four screws at the corners. Remove the support brackets on both sides.

We've taken out the motherboard.

There is a silicone heat sink pad on the top cover. Used for cooling NVMe SSDs. Flip the motherboard. Let's take a look at all the available interfaces.

Dual-channel DDR4 3200 MHz memory. One M.2 PCIe 4.0 x4 NVMe SSD. The other M.2 PCIe 4.0 x4 slot is vacant. Remove the NVMe SSD. Below is the Wi-Fi 6 wireless card.

# 稳定度与性能测试

BIOS can see it. 32GB DDR4 3200MHz memory installed.

Here are performance boost options. Performance mode: 65 watts. Balanced mode 54 watts. Silent mode 45 watts. We select performance mode 65 watts. Performing today's test.

Here you can set up call auto-start.

Stability is one of the issues we care about most. We open AIDA64. Run the FPU single-component stress test. CPU power consumption after 135 seconds. drops steadily from 70 watts to 65 watts. maximum system power consumption reaches 104 watts. drops and stabilizes at 97 watts. CPU frequency reduced to an average of 3.5 GHz. We have been stress-testing the CPU for 1 hour and 4 minutes continuously. The power consumption of the 13620H has remained at 65 watts consistently. Maximum CPU temperature reached 96 degrees. SSD temperature up to 50 degrees Celsius.

We'll use the Thunder God MIX mini PC's. i7-13620H CPU for transcoding. To see how it performs in practice. The final result is 14 minutes and 32 seconds. A total of 872 seconds. Higher than the 1360P we tested. Slightly lower than the 6900HX. CPU Z Multi-thread: 6146.2. Single-thread: 676.8. Multi-thread score exceeds that of the 1360P. And the 6900HX. Geekbench 5 Multi-core: 9144. Single-core: 1610. Multi-core score lower than 1360P. Slightly higher than 6900HX. Geekbench 6 Multi-core 9610. Single-core 2221. Lower than 1360P. Cinebench R23 Multi-core 13,540. Single-core: 1564. Multi-core score above 1360P. Lower than 6900HX.

Cinebench 2024 Multi-core: 745. Single-core: 97. Higher than the 6900HX. But lower than its own MIX Pro's 125H. PassMark multi-threaded: 24,129. Single-threaded: 3,505. Slightly lower than the 1360P. A bit higher than the XiaoXin 13500H. Overall,. The 13620H delivering 65W performance. Approaching the performance of the 1360P and 6900HX. Next, let's look at the Entertainment Master. Total score: 1,034,946. CPU score: 519,000. We also ran the openWRT test on the i7-13620H. running openWRT test. AES 758,238. chacha20 412,618. CoreMark 360,537. In terms of CoreMark performance. It exceeds 1360P and 13500H. Lower than 6900HX.

# 图形与游戏性能

Now let's play a game. League of Legends: Medium settings at 1080p. Finally, the average frame rate during the large team fight is around 110 FPS.

Genshin Impact: Medium quality at 1080p. Run and fight. Around 30 frames per second. This is the UHD integrated graphics of the 64EU processor. The gaming experience it brings us.

# 显示存储网络

Display output. HDMI port supports up to 4K@60Hz. 8-bit RGB display signal output. Type C and DP interfaces output DP signals. Supports up to 4K@144Hz. 8-bit RGB display signal output. Our monitor supports the DP interface. Overclocked to 160 Hz. Type C and DP ports after overclocking. Capable of supporting 4K at 160 Hz. 8-bit RGB display signal output. Sony OLED TV. Connect the HDMI cable. Display output of 4K60Hz 8-bit RGB signal. Let's take a look at the strengths of Intel UHD integrated graphics. Video decoding. It can hardware decode local 8K60fps AV1 videos at the highest level.

YouTube 8K60fps AV1 video. Still plays smoothly.

Original factory NVMe SSD test. 5300 MB/s. Typical performance level for PCIe 4.0 x4. Front-facing Type-C interface storage performance test. 1000 MB/s. WiFi Test. This time it's Realtek 8852BE. WiFi6 Wireless Network Card. Ran up to 740 Mbps. It's like my wireless network environment. A decent type.

# 功耗散热静音

Thunderobot MIX Mini PC. Equipped with 13th Gen Intel Core i7 CPU. 13620H. 65W performance boost. Power consumption performance under Windows. We're showing our list for everyone to see. Maximum CPU power consumption: 105 watts. Maximum idle power consumption: 25.5 watts. A 120-watt DC power supply is sufficient. This unit is an engineering prototype. The C States in BIOS are not enabled. Therefore, the standby power consumption is slightly higher. Final products should have this setting uniformly configured at factory. When the ambient temperature is 25 degrees. CPU idle temperature is 53 degrees. SSD idle temperature is 42 degrees.

This small desktop computer's CPU under full load. Body noise around 54 decibels. Reduced to 45 decibels when held next to the ear.

We conducted a burn-in test in balanced mode. Body noise at 48 decibels. 38 decibels when retracted next to the ear. This is considered quiet. Thunder God MIX Mini PC.

# 最后总结

Equipped with Intel CPU i7-13620H. Factory-set performance release of 65W. Performance is likely close to. 1360P and 6900HX. In performance mode. Single FPU stress test maximum temperature: 96 degrees Celsius. Noise level under full load: 45 decibels. Stable cooling and quiet operation. Compact and portable design. Exquisite craftsmanship. Beautiful design. Very high visual appeal. The device has three 4K display output ports on its body. The downside? Definitely a gigabit Ethernet port. It should be configured with 2.5G. To sum up. 65W performance output at factory. Close to i7-1360P and R9 6900HX. Quiet, stable cooling. Three display output interfaces available. Very high in appearance, extremely compact. 13th Gen Core mobile standard-voltage mini PC. Craftsmanship is quite refined. Perfect tool for office use and home HTPC. Alright! That's it for today. This is Lao Bai! Thank you all for watching! Goodbye!

=============

item.title: 不要钱的优质实时翻译AI服务！不操心的家庭AI大模型应用：网页实时翻译、视频实时字幕翻译！780M核显、M4 Mac mini、Max+ 395、2060、4060、4080！
item.itunes:title: 不要钱的优质实时翻译AI服务！不操心的家庭AI大模型应用：网页实时翻译、视频实时字幕翻译！780M核显、M4 Mac mini、Max+ 395、2060、4060、4080！
item.itunes:author: jack stone
item.itunes:summary:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t-K-skRZ6-I

值得閱讀的理由

  • 本摘要將揭示如何運用迷你電腦建立家用本地AI大型模型即時翻譯服務，實現免費、安全且高效的語言翻譯。
  • 讀者將了解不同迷你電腦硬體配置（從整合顯示卡到獨立顯示卡）在運行大型模型即時翻譯上的實際效能表現，為選擇適合的設備提供參考。
  • 摘要中提出的解決方案無需主動互動或提示詞，可在背景默默運行，隨時提供即時翻譯，大幅提升社群媒體或影片瀏覽體驗。

摘要

作者在影片開頭指出，他對市面上許多需要頻繁輸入提示詞的本地AI大型模型應用感到厭倦，轉而尋求一種無需主動互動、能在背景安靜運行，並隨時啟用的實用AI功能。身為重度網路使用者，作者發現即時外語翻譯工具是其日常不可或缺的需求，並特別強調對強力隱私保護的重視。經過實際測試與驗證，作者確信唯有運用本地大型語言模型服務，才能同時滿足流暢度與安全性這兩項基本要求，同時避免了線上付費服務可能帶來的成本高昂、不流暢及不保密等缺點。作者提到，許多迷你電腦已完全具備運行此類服務的硬體條件，足以成為家用實用AI服務器。

家用AI即時翻譯服務架構

為了實現這項計畫，作者規劃了一套服務架構：首先，一台能夠運行本地AI大型語言模型的迷你電腦將被設定為AI伺服器，其作業系統可以是Windows、Linux或macOS。該伺服器會安裝並運行LM Studio軟體，以提供大型語言模型服務，並透過家庭網路與其他設備共享。作為終端設備，用戶可以使用Windows PC、筆記型電腦、Mac，甚至iPhone或平板電腦。這些終端設備只需運行網頁瀏覽器（如Chrome、Safari或Edge），並安裝一個語言翻譯外掛程式（例如Immersive Translate或其他開源翻譯外掛），即可透過外掛存取迷你主機上LM Studio所提供的本地大型語言模型共享服務，從而實現即時線上翻譯。

測試硬體與模型準備

在測試硬體方面，作者準備了多款從舊到新的迷你電腦進行效能評估，包括兩台配備780M整合顯示卡的迷你桌上型電腦、一台僅具備16GB統一記憶體的M4 Mac mini、一台搭載RTX 2060 6GB顯示記憶體的舊款幻影峽谷迷你電腦，以及配備RTX 4060 8GB顯示記憶體的MS-01迷你工作站。此外，還有透過Oculink介面外接Morefine G1顯示卡塢（內含RTX 4080 12GB顯示記憶體）連接至天寶8845HS迷你電腦的配置，以及AMD目前的主打產品——配備Max+ 395 8060S整合顯示卡的迷你電腦，該卡可配置高達96GB的顯示記憶體。在軟體與模型選擇上，測試將在迷你電腦上運行LM Studio提供網路共享服務，並透過客戶端的Cherry Studio軟體及網頁瀏覽器上的翻譯外掛程式，測試網路共享大型模型的翻譯輸出速度。本次即時翻譯主要使用的模型為開源的Qwen3 30B A3B 2507的各種量化版本，以及尺寸較小的Qwen3 4B 2507模型。

各式迷你電腦翻譯效能實測

作者首先測試了配備780M整合顯示卡的聯想百應8745HS迷你電腦。在分配16GB記憶體作為顯示記憶體並運行15GB大小的Qwen3 30B A3B 2507 (Q3_k_l) 模型時，其翻譯共享服務速度達到28 tok/s。即使是僅分配8GB顯示記憶體的1位元量化版本，速度依然維持28 tok/s。另一台天寶MACO（同樣是780M整合顯示卡）的測試結果略快，達到31 tok/s，這比線上DeepSeek V3的19 tok/s快了超過50%。

接著，M4 Mac mini由於僅有16GB統一記憶體，運行4.29GB大小的Qwen3 4B 2507 (q_8_0) 模型時，速度為23 tok/s。雖然略低於780M整合顯示卡（27 tok/s），但仍超越線上DeepSeek V3，並且具備安全性和免費的優勢，非常適合作為全天候運行的家用即時翻譯伺服器。

隨後測試的是配備RTX 2060 6GB顯示記憶體的舊款幻影峽谷迷你電腦。憑藉336 GB/秒的記憶體頻寬，其運行Qwen3 4B 2507 (q8) 模型時，平均速度高達40 tok/s，明顯快於780M整合顯示卡超過30%，效能表現非常出色，甚至超過了閱讀速度。

接下來是MS-01迷你工作站，配備了RTX 4060 8GB顯示記憶體（記憶體頻寬256 GB/秒），其文字翻譯速度達到45 tok/s，表現略優於RTX 2060，同樣被歸類為出色效能。

而透過Oculink外接RTX 4080 12GB顯示記憶體的Morefine G1顯示卡塢，連接至天寶8845HS迷你電腦，在運行Qwen3 4B 2507 (q8_0) 模型時，平均速度達到70 tok/s。更令人驚訝的是，運行Qwen3 30B A3B 1位元量化版本時，速度甚至能飆升至100 tok/s，成為本次測試中最快的組合。

最後，作者測試了擁有高達96GB可配置顯示記憶體的Max+ 395 8060S整合顯示卡。儘管記憶體頻寬接近200 GB/秒，其在運行多種模型時，翻譯速度皆超過40 tok/s。即使是32GB大小的Qwen3 30B A3B q8模型，也能達到50 tok/s的輸出速度，再次證明了其卓越的效能。

結論與綜合評比

作者在影片結尾提供了一份所有測試迷你電腦在大型語言模型即時翻譯輸出效能的總結圖表。如果受到顯示記憶體大小限制，選擇Qwen3 4B 2507 q8作為共享大型模型，則最強的RTX 4080行動版可達到70 tok/s。而8060S整合顯示卡與RTX 4060行動版均達到45 tok/s，RTX 2060行動版也能達到40 tok/s。作者將超過40 tok/s定義為「出色效能」，認為這基本上已超越了人類的閱讀速度，並且是線上DeepSeek V3翻譯輸出速度的兩倍。至於780M整合顯示卡則提供27 tok/s的效能，略優於M4 Mac mini的23 tok/s，顯示即使是整合顯示卡也能提供優於線上服務的本地翻譯體驗。

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t-K-skRZ6-I

值得閱讀的理由

  • 本摘要將揭示如何運用迷你電腦建立家用本地AI大型模型即時翻譯服務，實現免費、安全且高效的語言翻譯。
  • 讀者將了解不同迷你電腦硬體配置（從整合顯示卡到獨立顯示卡）在運行大型模型即時翻譯上的實際效能表現，為選擇適合的設備提供參考。
  • 摘要中提出的解決方案無需主動互動或提示詞，可在背景默默運行，隨時提供即時翻譯，大幅提升社群媒體或影片瀏覽體驗。

摘要

作者在影片開頭指出，他對市面上許多需要頻繁輸入提示詞的本地AI大型模型應用感到厭倦，轉而尋求一種無需主動互動、能在背景安靜運行，並隨時啟用的實用AI功能。身為重度網路使用者，作者發現即時外語翻譯工具是其日常不可或缺的需求，並特別強調對強力隱私保護的重視。經過實際測試與驗證，作者確信唯有運用本地大型語言模型服務，才能同時滿足流暢度與安全性這兩項基本要求，同時避免了線上付費服務可能帶來的成本高昂、不流暢及不保密等缺點。作者提到，許多迷你電腦已完全具備運行此類服務的硬體條件，足以成為家用實用AI服務器。

家用AI即時翻譯服務架構

為了實現這項計畫，作者規劃了一套服務架構：首先，一台能夠運行本地AI大型語言模型的迷你電腦將被設定為AI伺服器，其作業系統可以是Windows、Linux或macOS。該伺服器會安裝並運行LM Studio軟體，以提供大型語言模型服務，並透過家庭網路與其他設備共享。作為終端設備，用戶可以使用Windows PC、筆記型電腦、Mac，甚至iPhone或平板電腦。這些終端設備只需運行網頁瀏覽器（如Chrome、Safari或Edge），並安裝一個語言翻譯外掛程式（例如Immersive Translate或其他開源翻譯外掛），即可透過外掛存取迷你主機上LM Studio所提供的本地大型語言模型共享服務，從而實現即時線上翻譯。

測試硬體與模型準備

在測試硬體方面，作者準備了多款從舊到新的迷你電腦進行效能評估，包括兩台配備780M整合顯示卡的迷你桌上型電腦、一台僅具備16GB統一記憶體的M4 Mac mini、一台搭載RTX 2060 6GB顯示記憶體的舊款幻影峽谷迷你電腦，以及配備RTX 4060 8GB顯示記憶體的MS-01迷你工作站。此外，還有透過Oculink介面外接Morefine G1顯示卡塢（內含RTX 4080 12GB顯示記憶體）連接至天寶8845HS迷你電腦的配置，以及AMD目前的主打產品——配備Max+ 395 8060S整合顯示卡的迷你電腦，該卡可配置高達96GB的顯示記憶體。在軟體與模型選擇上，測試將在迷你電腦上運行LM Studio提供網路共享服務，並透過客戶端的Cherry Studio軟體及網頁瀏覽器上的翻譯外掛程式，測試網路共享大型模型的翻譯輸出速度。本次即時翻譯主要使用的模型為開源的Qwen3 30B A3B 2507的各種量化版本，以及尺寸較小的Qwen3 4B 2507模型。

各式迷你電腦翻譯效能實測

作者首先測試了配備780M整合顯示卡的聯想百應8745HS迷你電腦。在分配16GB記憶體作為顯示記憶體並運行15GB大小的Qwen3 30B A3B 2507 (Q3_k_l) 模型時，其翻譯共享服務速度達到28 tok/s。即使是僅分配8GB顯示記憶體的1位元量化版本，速度依然維持28 tok/s。另一台天寶MACO（同樣是780M整合顯示卡）的測試結果略快，達到31 tok/s，這比線上DeepSeek V3的19 tok/s快了超過50%。

接著，M4 Mac mini由於僅有16GB統一記憶體，運行4.29GB大小的Qwen3 4B 2507 (q_8_0) 模型時，速度為23 tok/s。雖然略低於780M整合顯示卡（27 tok/s），但仍超越線上DeepSeek V3，並且具備安全性和免費的優勢，非常適合作為全天候運行的家用即時翻譯伺服器。

隨後測試的是配備RTX 2060 6GB顯示記憶體的舊款幻影峽谷迷你電腦。憑藉336 GB/秒的記憶體頻寬，其運行Qwen3 4B 2507 (q8) 模型時，平均速度高達40 tok/s，明顯快於780M整合顯示卡超過30%，效能表現非常出色，甚至超過了閱讀速度。

接下來是MS-01迷你工作站，配備了RTX 4060 8GB顯示記憶體（記憶體頻寬256 GB/秒），其文字翻譯速度達到45 tok/s，表現略優於RTX 2060，同樣被歸類為出色效能。

而透過Oculink外接RTX 4080 12GB顯示記憶體的Morefine G1顯示卡塢，連接至天寶8845HS迷你電腦，在運行Qwen3 4B 2507 (q8_0) 模型時，平均速度達到70 tok/s。更令人驚訝的是，運行Qwen3 30B A3B 1位元量化版本時，速度甚至能飆升至100 tok/s，成為本次測試中最快的組合。

最後，作者測試了擁有高達96GB可配置顯示記憶體的Max+ 395 8060S整合顯示卡。儘管記憶體頻寬接近200 GB/秒，其在運行多種模型時，翻譯速度皆超過40 tok/s。即使是32GB大小的Qwen3 30B A3B q8模型，也能達到50 tok/s的輸出速度，再次證明了其卓越的效能。

結論與綜合評比

作者在影片結尾提供了一份所有測試迷你電腦在大型語言模型即時翻譯輸出效能的總結圖表。如果受到顯示記憶體大小限制，選擇Qwen3 4B 2507 q8作為共享大型模型，則最強的RTX 4080行動版可達到70 tok/s。而8060S整合顯示卡與RTX 4060行動版均達到45 tok/s，RTX 2060行動版也能達到40 tok/s。作者將超過40 tok/s定義為「出色效能」，認為這基本上已超越了人類的閱讀速度，並且是線上DeepSeek V3翻譯輸出速度的兩倍。至於780M整合顯示卡則提供27 tok/s的效能，略優於M4 Mac mini的23 tok/s，顯示即使是整合顯示卡也能提供優於線上服務的本地翻譯體驗。

================================================

item.content:encoded:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t-K-skRZ6-I

值得閱讀的理由

  • 本摘要將揭示如何運用迷你電腦建立家用本地AI大型模型即時翻譯服務，實現免費、安全且高效的語言翻譯。
  • 讀者將了解不同迷你電腦硬體配置（從整合顯示卡到獨立顯示卡）在運行大型模型即時翻譯上的實際效能表現，為選擇適合的設備提供參考。
  • 摘要中提出的解決方案無需主動互動或提示詞，可在背景默默運行，隨時提供即時翻譯，大幅提升社群媒體或影片瀏覽體驗。

摘要

作者在影片開頭指出，他對市面上許多需要頻繁輸入提示詞的本地AI大型模型應用感到厭倦，轉而尋求一種無需主動互動、能在背景安靜運行，並隨時啟用的實用AI功能。身為重度網路使用者，作者發現即時外語翻譯工具是其日常不可或缺的需求，並特別強調對強力隱私保護的重視。經過實際測試與驗證，作者確信唯有運用本地大型語言模型服務，才能同時滿足流暢度與安全性這兩項基本要求，同時避免了線上付費服務可能帶來的成本高昂、不流暢及不保密等缺點。作者提到，許多迷你電腦已完全具備運行此類服務的硬體條件，足以成為家用實用AI服務器。

家用AI即時翻譯服務架構

為了實現這項計畫，作者規劃了一套服務架構：首先，一台能夠運行本地AI大型語言模型的迷你電腦將被設定為AI伺服器，其作業系統可以是Windows、Linux或macOS。該伺服器會安裝並運行LM Studio軟體，以提供大型語言模型服務，並透過家庭網路與其他設備共享。作為終端設備，用戶可以使用Windows PC、筆記型電腦、Mac，甚至iPhone或平板電腦。這些終端設備只需運行網頁瀏覽器（如Chrome、Safari或Edge），並安裝一個語言翻譯外掛程式（例如Immersive Translate或其他開源翻譯外掛），即可透過外掛存取迷你主機上LM Studio所提供的本地大型語言模型共享服務，從而實現即時線上翻譯。

測試硬體與模型準備

在測試硬體方面，作者準備了多款從舊到新的迷你電腦進行效能評估，包括兩台配備780M整合顯示卡的迷你桌上型電腦、一台僅具備16GB統一記憶體的M4 Mac mini、一台搭載RTX 2060 6GB顯示記憶體的舊款幻影峽谷迷你電腦，以及配備RTX 4060 8GB顯示記憶體的MS-01迷你工作站。此外，還有透過Oculink介面外接Morefine G1顯示卡塢（內含RTX 4080 12GB顯示記憶體）連接至天寶8845HS迷你電腦的配置，以及AMD目前的主打產品——配備Max+ 395 8060S整合顯示卡的迷你電腦，該卡可配置高達96GB的顯示記憶體。在軟體與模型選擇上，測試將在迷你電腦上運行LM Studio提供網路共享服務，並透過客戶端的Cherry Studio軟體及網頁瀏覽器上的翻譯外掛程式，測試網路共享大型模型的翻譯輸出速度。本次即時翻譯主要使用的模型為開源的Qwen3 30B A3B 2507的各種量化版本，以及尺寸較小的Qwen3 4B 2507模型。

各式迷你電腦翻譯效能實測

作者首先測試了配備780M整合顯示卡的聯想百應8745HS迷你電腦。在分配16GB記憶體作為顯示記憶體並運行15GB大小的Qwen3 30B A3B 2507 (Q3_k_l) 模型時，其翻譯共享服務速度達到28 tok/s。即使是僅分配8GB顯示記憶體的1位元量化版本，速度依然維持28 tok/s。另一台天寶MACO（同樣是780M整合顯示卡）的測試結果略快，達到31 tok/s，這比線上DeepSeek V3的19 tok/s快了超過50%。

接著，M4 Mac mini由於僅有16GB統一記憶體，運行4.29GB大小的Qwen3 4B 2507 (q_8_0) 模型時，速度為23 tok/s。雖然略低於780M整合顯示卡（27 tok/s），但仍超越線上DeepSeek V3，並且具備安全性和免費的優勢，非常適合作為全天候運行的家用即時翻譯伺服器。

隨後測試的是配備RTX 2060 6GB顯示記憶體的舊款幻影峽谷迷你電腦。憑藉336 GB/秒的記憶體頻寬，其運行Qwen3 4B 2507 (q8) 模型時，平均速度高達40 tok/s，明顯快於780M整合顯示卡超過30%，效能表現非常出色，甚至超過了閱讀速度。

接下來是MS-01迷你工作站，配備了RTX 4060 8GB顯示記憶體（記憶體頻寬256 GB/秒），其文字翻譯速度達到45 tok/s，表現略優於RTX 2060，同樣被歸類為出色效能。

而透過Oculink外接RTX 4080 12GB顯示記憶體的Morefine G1顯示卡塢，連接至天寶8845HS迷你電腦，在運行Qwen3 4B 2507 (q8_0) 模型時，平均速度達到70 tok/s。更令人驚訝的是，運行Qwen3 30B A3B 1位元量化版本時，速度甚至能飆升至100 tok/s，成為本次測試中最快的組合。

最後，作者測試了擁有高達96GB可配置顯示記憶體的Max+ 395 8060S整合顯示卡。儘管記憶體頻寬接近200 GB/秒，其在運行多種模型時，翻譯速度皆超過40 tok/s。即使是32GB大小的Qwen3 30B A3B q8模型，也能達到50 tok/s的輸出速度，再次證明了其卓越的效能。

結論與綜合評比

作者在影片結尾提供了一份所有測試迷你電腦在大型語言模型即時翻譯輸出效能的總結圖表。如果受到顯示記憶體大小限制，選擇Qwen3 4B 2507 q8作為共享大型模型，則最強的RTX 4080行動版可達到70 tok/s。而8060S整合顯示卡與RTX 4060行動版均達到45 tok/s，RTX 2060行動版也能達到40 tok/s。作者將超過40 tok/s定義為「出色效能」，認為這基本上已超越了人類的閱讀速度，並且是線上DeepSeek V3翻譯輸出速度的兩倍。至於780M整合顯示卡則提供27 tok/s的效能，略優於M4 Mac mini的23 tok/s，顯示即使是整合顯示卡也能提供優於線上服務的本地翻譯體驗。

================================================

# Intro

Effortlessly handle real-time translation output services. Powerful Max+ 395. 70 tokens per second. Deliver smoother, higher-quality real-time translation text. Today we're going to talk about this. We've tested dozens of mini PCs. Having them write code and chat. And make them keep drawing those things endlessly. Just at a glance.
